post.body: dunno--I think I left out a d, should be "hare's breadth", yeah? definitely not "hair's", cuz that would be @steamykitchen
work it baby. work it.
au contraire sensei, 20mins from our Normande cows & from Manresa garden, Freddy Fungus knocking on our doors with foraged fungi..
I have a feeling you won't like Zuni burger. I think it's delicious but not really a "burger" --clear your mind before eating it
coming from you that's impressive! You should go across the Bay and try the burger at the bar at Murray Circle in Sausalito
the one with the worm patch in the back too? Forgot the name--near Russel Sq. or Holborn tube, sth like that?
FIFTY THOUSAND, BABY!! And change! http://www.firstgiving.com/menuforhope5
Menu for Hope is a hare's breath of $50K!! http://www.firstgiving.com/menuforhope5
Cal Staminov at Bernadus is a master of fire, I'll eat just about anything that man roasts *food 9*
At Bernadus again, the lodge so lovely all dressed in holiday lights *moments 8*
my cleaning lady Ophelia brought presents today: banana leaf-wrapped tamales she made for her family's holidays. They"re amazing. *food 9*
Happy birthday David darling. At least one of my Davids is happy and carefree today
favorite Christmas present http://tinyurl.com/ferranbowls --Happy holidays all (and happy chinese take-out day too!) *moments 8*
a pot of Sencha from Uji did the calming trick, now can drag my sick self to bed for real *tea 9.5*
I'm sick like a dog - these cold days suit me not at all - but still super happy that Menu for Hope has gone up over $30K, and counting!
Dear Santa, would you please move Pizzaiolo a little - ok, a lot - closer to me? What simple, what fantastic food! *food 9*
..live crab Eddy at the dock, farmer mkt 2 blcks away, sunday dinners at La Posta, wine at Soif (plus our cellar) Mi Santa Cruz no es tu SC
Thx all who replied to my zipcar query @sixy the ins problem seems to have been fixed, now it covers up to 300K, which is reasonable I think
No citycarshare in santa cruz but zipcar is a block from us. D & I often joke we need 1.5 cars not 2-so it's tempting--but mentally tough!
Anyone use Zipcar? I'm considering joining instead of getting a new lease or buy, but a little hesitant. Have not *not* have a car for years
